actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct inequities in the determination of rates of basic pay in conversions to the General Schedule of employees and positions subject to prevailing rate pay schedules.

summary.text: Provides, in the determination of rates of basic pay in conversions to the General Schedule of employees and positions subject to prevailing rate pay schedules, that employees who were receiving night differential under specified conditions shall be entitled to an inclusion of his differential pay in his new basic pay rate. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5334)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct inequities in the determination of rates of basic pay in conversions to the General Schedule of employees and positions subject to prevailing rate pay schedules.
